properties.name: Reason
properties.description: Why Observable Risk Score is raised

This workflow takes a CRUD atomic actions of SMXD to raise the risk score of an observable and issue an individual judgement
as well as response actions depending on the observable type and judgement disposition.

Target Group: Default TargetGroup

Targets Used: CTR_For_Access_Token, Private_CTIA_Target


Steps:
[] Validate that the observable type is supported by SMXD
[] Search for the observable
[] If not found, create the observable in SMXD with a score of 1
[] Start by raising the score
[] Generate Access token for SXTR and convert the risk score to a judgement
[]> If disposition is Common, go into the Common respond actions
[]> If disposition is Suspicious, go into the suspicious respond actions
[]> If disposition is Malicious, go into the Malicious respond actions

More details are available at https://github.com/kcdubois/sxo-secure-meter-xd

Target Group: Default TargetGroup
Target Group Type: HTTP Endpoint, SMTP Endpoint(optional)
Targets Used: CTR_For_Access_Token, Private_CTIA_Target, AMP_Target(optional), Duo(optional), SWC_Target(optional), Azure_For_Access_Token(optional), Azure_Graph_API(optional)

Response module are DISABLE per default. Please turn on Response based on use cases.

Steps:
[] 

More details are available at https://github.com/kcdubois/sxo-secure-meter-xd\n
